Question
========

A person achieves a score of 14.4 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 11 with a standard deviation 3.6. The z-score of the person with 14.4 correct is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.21
* 0.94
* 1.85

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.21: Incorrect
* 0.94: Correct
* 1.85: Incorrect
